topic.title: Creating Cinder Volumes for Boot Images
topic.shortdesc: You can create Cinder volumes to store VM boot images.

body.p: The use of Cinder volumes is recommended for fast instance booting.

ol.li: Log in as the appropriate tenant.
On the Project menu, open the Compute section, and then click Volumes.
On the Volumes page, click Create Volume
ol.p: For an example, see the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Reference Deployment Scenarios: Creating a Volume.
